attributes.action: Create discussion threads below each petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please create the ability to post messages below each petition for people to read before deciding on whether to sign. This would promote open discussion and allow the public to see both sides to the arguement

rejection.details: We'll treat this as feedback. We have already considered this and, on balance, decided not to proceed yet, but we will think again.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
